title: My Pregnancy Journey
description:
Download Africa’s first educational pregnancy tracker app, a personalized app with 30+ unique pregnancy app features that updates new content, videos, and information each week, guiding you right through your whole pregnancy journey!

My Pregnancy Journey App offers you a beautiful digital pregnancy companion that helps you track each stage of your special pregnancy journey!

⭐ Download ‘My Pregnancy Journey’ app here ⭐

EDUCATIONAL TOOLS   🧰
✏️ Gynaecology and Yoga videos, new weekly gynae and yoga videos
✏️ Mom Weekly, up-to-date new weekly info on mom’s changing body 
✏️ Baby Weekly, new weekly updates on the development of your new growing baby
✏️ Nutrition, 26 pages on all thing’s health and nutrition during pregnancy  
✏️ Everything Labour, all you need to know about what to expect 
✏️ Weekly articles, weekly new articles to help track your pregnancy journey  
✏️ Scan + 3D Images + 4D videos, make use of these tools 
✏️ Baby Size Guide, keep up to date with your growing baby’s height and weight 

INTERACTIVE   📝
💗 Due Date Calculator, personalize the app for yourself by adding your due date
💗 Your Own Digital Journal, document your journey in your own digital journal
💗 Own Medical Card, make use of the digital medical card to document your info 
💗 BMI Calculator, keep track of your body mass index 
💗 Community Chat Groups, connect with other new moms-to-be all over the world
💗 Baby Kick Counter, it is important to start counting your growing baby’s kicks 
💗 Birth Plan Guidelines, write down what you expect on that special day
💗 Hospital Bag Checklists, we have created checklists for mom, baby, and partner
💗 Dad Checklist, get your partner in on the action, we have a section just for him
💗 Contraction Counter, document and save your contractions as soon as they start


OTHER APP FEATURES   🔔   
📌 Pregnancy tracker, counting your journey down in months, weeks, and days

📌 Weekly reminders, weekly new important reminders, and tips 
📌 Safe Medication, always consult with a profession before taking any medication
📌 Exercise information, general exercise tips, benefits, and safe exercising

📌 Directory Listing, here we list local services providers, products, and businesses 
 
📌 Birthing Kit Foundation, support this amazing organization 

AWARD WINNING APP 🏆  
My Pregnancy Journey App has been recognized by various global organizations and has received multiple App awards for our educational and unique approach.

FOLLOW US ON OUR PAGES 🔗

✔️   https://www.mypregnancyjourney.co.za/
✔️   https://www.facebook.com/MyPregnancyJourneyApp
✔️   https://www.instagram.com/mypregnancyjourneyapp/

DISCLAIMER 📢

All the information provided on our app are only guidelines and are not intended to replace the professional guidance of a medical specialist; we are providing information to you on a general information basis only.  My Pregnancy Journey disclaims any liability for the decisions you make based on this information.
